item.title: 'They couldn't stop him': The oral history of Dirk's 1998 Nike Hoop Summit
item.description: It's the performance that set in motion a 21-year Hall of Fame career. And it took a secret trip out of Germany to make it happen.

item.title: Kraft's attorneys allege illegal search by police
item.description: Attorneys for Patriots owner Robert Kraft allege video cameras that were hidden by police inside the Orchids of Asia Day Spa violated constitutional privacy protections.

item.title: Popovich ejected 63 seconds into Nuggets game
item.description: Spurs coach Gregg Popovich was hit with two technical fouls and ejected after arguing a non-call on the Nuggets' Paul Millsap just 1 minute, 3 seconds into Wednesday's game.

item.title: Officials dismiss felony charge against Bennett
item.description: Prosecutors have moved to drop a felony charge against Patriots DE Michael Bennett "in the interest of justice" after video evidence was unable to prove a crime was committed after Super Bowl LI in Houston.

item.title: Stafford's wife having surgery for brain tumor
item.description: Kelly Stafford, the wife of Lions quarterback Matthew Stafford, will undergo surgery for a brain tumor, she said Wednesday in a post on social media.

item.title: Hall of Fame ex-Braves skipper Cox in hospital
item.description: Hall of Famer Bobby Cox, the Braves' former longtime manager, has been admitted to an Atlanta-area hospital.

item.title: McGregor insults Khabib's wife, religion in tweet
item.description: Retired UFC fighter Conor McGregor posted and quickly deleted a tweet which insulted the wife and religion of current lightweight champion Khabib Nurmagomedov.

item.title: The ultimate NFL draft glossary: Glass-eater, fluid hips, cow on ice and more
item.description: Every industry has its insider lingo. Impress your friends and sound like a draft expert by learning these simple terms.

item.title: Ranking today's MLB stars by their Griffey Factor
item.description: Who swings like The Kid? Who plays with No. 24's flair in the field? To celebrate the 30th anniversary of Ken Griffey Jr.'s major league debut, we judge how baseball's biggest names stack up to Junior.

item.title: Women's Final Four primer: What to watch for in Baylor-Oregon and Notre Dame-UConn
item.description: Baylor, UConn, Notre Dame and Oregon will square off the title. We break down each team's chances of winning, the biggest questions in Tampa and more.

item.title: WNBA mock draft 2019 - Predicting all three rounds
item.description: Six players projected to be first-round picks in our third WNBA mock draft will play Friday in the Women's Final Four. Sabrina Ionescu remains No. 1.

item.title: How a 14-cent parlay won $1,300: A March Madness love story
item.description: One bettor beat the odds and turned the final 14 cents left on his app account into over $1,300 in a March Madness parlay, but his girlfriend just might end up being the big winner.

item.title: 15 minutes of ... insane - From accountant to NHL goalie
item.description: Scott Foster, who lived many NHL fans' dream by playing as an emergency backup goalie, explains how his life has changed since that fateful night.

item.title: NHL player tracking system plans to use 'obsolete' optical option
item.description: As the NHL looks to add robust player and puck tracking for 2019-20, the exciting development comes with a caveat.

item.title: Inside Mike McCarthy's split with Packers and what's next for him
item.description: In his first interview since being fired Dec. 2, McCarthy addresses claims complacency set in with the Packers, his relationship with Aaron Rodgers, advice for his successor and more.

item.title: Hudson-Odoi makes dream first EPL start in Chelsea win
item.description: It was a dream first Premier League start for Callum Hudson-Odoi as he set up the first goal in Chelsea's 3-0 home romp over Brighton.

item.title: Xavier Thomas leads Clemson's next wave of defensive stars
item.description: How do you replace a once-in-a-lifetime defensive front? Heading into its spring game, Clemson's about to find out.

item.title: The lapsed fan's guide to WrestleMania 35
item.description: Planning on watching WrestleMania 35 but not up to speed on current storylines? Here's a primer that should answer all of your questions heading into Sunday's event.

item.title: From NCAA to MMA: More college wrestlers are fighting on
item.description: Want to see the future of mixed martial arts? Look no further than the NCAA wrestling championships: A growing number of competitors there will eventually fight professionally.

item.title: Done with feeling at a loss, Tyron Woodley aims to be called 'Champ' again
item.description: Tyron Woodley was reminded of the cruel realities of the fight game last month when he dropped the UFC welterweight title to Kamaru Usman. Woodley was feeling down, but now he's determined to rise back to the top of the game.

item.title: Unifying 175-pound titles a goal for Gvozdyk
item.description: Light heavyweight champion Oleksandr Gvozdyk wants the opportunity to fight for the other belts in the division. And there are a lot of good matchups to be made for him to fulfill his wish.

item.title: Devon Bling will take the memory of his mother to the first tee at the Masters
item.description: His mother missed only one tournament. That was the day she died. The UCLA sophomore, who will be one of six amateurs in the Masters field, will still have her with him at Augusta National.

item.title: Daily notes: Pitcher projections and hitter ratings for Thursday
item.description: Prepare your fantasy baseball lineups with confidence with our daily preview, including pitcher projections, hitter matchup ratings and more.
